verses.kjv: Afterward he brought me to the gate, even the gate that looketh toward the east:
verses.web: Afterward he brought me to the gate, even the gate that looks toward the east.
verses.ct: Then the man brought me to the gate — the one facing east.

verses.kjv: And, behold, the glory of the God of Israel came from the way of the east: and his voice was like a noise of many waters: and the earth shined with his glory.
verses.web: Behold, the glory of the God of Israel came from the way of the east. His voice was like the sound of many waters; and the earth was illuminated with his glory.
verses.ct: And there it was: the glory of the God of Israel, coming from the east. His voice roared like the sound of rushing waters, and the earth blazed with his glory.

verses.kjv: And it was according to the appearance of the vision which I saw, even according to the vision that I saw when I came to destroy the city: and the visions were like the vision that I saw by the river Chebar; and I fell upon my face.
verses.web: It was according to the appearance of the vision which I saw, even according to the vision that I saw when I came to destroy the city; and the visions were like the vision that I saw by the river Chebar; and I fell on my face.
verses.ct: The vision looked exactly like what I had seen before — like the vision I saw when I came to prophesy the city's destruction, and like the vision I saw by the Chebar River. I fell facedown on the ground.

verses.kjv: And the glory of the LORD came into the house by the way of the gate whose prospect is toward the east.
verses.web: LORD’s glory came into the house by the way of the gate which faces toward the east.
verses.ct: The glory of the LORD entered the temple through the gate that faces east.

verses.kjv: So the spirit took me up, and brought me into the inner court; and, behold, the glory of the LORD filled the house.
verses.web: The Spirit took me up, and brought me into the inner court; and behold, LORD’s glory filled the house.
verses.ct: Then the Spirit lifted me up and carried me into the inner court, and I watched as the glory of the LORD filled the entire temple.

verses.kjv: And I heard him speaking unto me out of the house; and the man stood by me.
verses.web: I heard one speaking to me out of the house; and a man stood by me.
verses.ct: I heard someone speaking to me from inside the temple, while the man stood beside me.

verses.kjv: And he said unto me, Son of man, the place of my throne, and the place of the soles of my feet, where I will dwell in the midst of the children of Israel for ever, and my holy name, shall the house of Israel no more defile, neither they, nor their kings, by their whoredom, nor by the carcases of their kings in their high places.
verses.web: He said to me, “Son of man, this is the place of my throne, and the place of the soles of my feet, where I will dwell among the children of Israel forever. The house of Israel will no more defile my holy name, neither they, nor their kings, by their prostitution, and by the dead bodies of their kings in their high places;
verses.ct: The voice said to me, "Son of man, this is the place of my throne and the place where my feet will rest. I will live here among the people of Israel forever. Never again will the house of Israel defile my holy name — not them, not their kings — with their spiritual prostitution or by burying their kings' corpses in their high places.

verses.kjv: In their setting of their threshold by my thresholds, and their post by my posts, and the wall between me and them, they have even defiled my holy name by their abominations that they have committed: wherefore I have consumed them in mine anger.
verses.web: in their setting of their threshold by my threshold, and their door post beside my door post. There was a wall between me and them; and they have defiled my holy name by their abominations which they have committed. Therefore I have consumed them in my anger.
verses.ct: They placed their doorsteps right next to my doorstep and their doorposts right beside my doorposts, with only a wall between us. They defiled my holy name with the disgusting things they did, so I destroyed them in my anger.

verses.kjv: Now let them put away their whoredom, and the carcases of their kings, far from me, and I will dwell in the midst of them for ever.
verses.web: Now let them put away their prostitution, and the dead bodies of their kings, far from me. Then I will dwell among them forever.
verses.ct: Now let them get rid of their prostitution and their kings' corpses, putting all of it far away from me. Then I will live among them forever.

verses.kjv: Thou son of man, shew the house to the house of Israel, that they may be ashamed of their iniquities: and let them measure the pattern.
verses.web: “You, son of man, show the house to the house of Israel, that they may be ashamed of their iniquities; and let them measure the pattern.
verses.ct: "Son of man, describe this temple to the people of Israel so they will be ashamed of their sins. Let them study its design carefully.

verses.kjv: And if they be ashamed of all that they have done, shew them the form of the house, and the fashion thereof, and the goings out thereof, and the comings in thereof, and all the forms thereof, and all the ordinances thereof, and all the forms thereof, and all the laws thereof: and write it in their sight, that they may keep the whole form thereof, and all the ordinances thereof, and do them.
verses.web: If they are ashamed of all that they have done, make known to them the form of the house, and its fashion, and its exits, and its entrances, and all its forms, and all its ordinances, and all its forms, and all its laws; and write it in their sight; that they may keep the whole form of it, and all its ordinances, and do them.
verses.ct: If they are ashamed of everything they've done, then show them the full plan of the temple — its layout, its exits and entrances, its complete design, and all its regulations and laws. Write it all down where they can see it, so they can follow the entire design and obey every regulation.

verses.kjv: This is the law of the house; Upon the top of the mountain the whole limit thereof round about shall be most holy. Behold, this is the law of the house.
verses.web: “This is the law of the house. On the top of the mountain the whole limit around it shall be most holy. Behold, this is the law of the house.
verses.ct: "This is the foundational law of the temple: the entire area on top of the mountain, everything within its boundaries, is most holy. That is the law of the temple.

verses.kjv: And these are the measures of the altar after the cubits: The cubit is a cubit and an hand breadth; even the bottom shall be a cubit, and the breadth a cubit, and the border thereof by the edge thereof round about shall be a span: and this shall be the higher place of the altar.
verses.web: “These are the measurements of the altar by cubits (the cubit is a cubit and a hand width): the bottom shall be a cubit, and the width a cubit, and its border around its edge a span; and this shall be the base of the altar.
verses.ct: "These are the measurements of the altar, using the long cubit (which is a standard cubit plus a hand width): The gutter at the base is 1 cubit deep and 1 cubit wide, with a rim around its edge that is 1 span high. This forms the base of the altar.

verses.kjv: And from the bottom upon the ground even to the lower settle shall be two cubits, and the breadth one cubit; and from the lesser settle even to the greater settle shall be four cubits, and the breadth one cubit.
verses.web: From the bottom on the ground to the lower ledge shall be two cubits, and the width one cubit; and from the lesser ledge to the greater ledge shall be four cubits, and the width a cubit.
verses.ct: From the ground-level gutter up to the lower ledge is 2 cubits, and the ledge extends out 1 cubit. From the lower ledge to the upper ledge is 4 cubits, and that ledge also extends out 1 cubit.

verses.kjv: So the altar shall be four cubits; and from the altar and upward shall be four horns.
verses.web: The upper altar shall be four cubits; and from the altar hearth and upward there shall be four horns.
verses.ct: The altar hearth above that is 4 cubits high, and 4 horns project upward from its corners.

verses.kjv: And the altar shall be twelve cubits long, twelve broad, square in the four squares thereof.
verses.web: The altar hearth shall be twelve cubits long by twelve wide, square in its four sides.
verses.ct: The altar hearth is square — 12 cubits long and 12 cubits wide on each side.

verses.kjv: And the settle shall be fourteen cubits long and fourteen broad in the four squares thereof; and the border about it shall be half a cubit; and the bottom thereof shall be a cubit about; and his stairs shall look toward the east.
verses.web: The ledge shall be fourteen cubits long by fourteen wide in its four sides; and the border about it shall be half a cubit; and its bottom shall be a cubit around; and its steps shall look toward the east.”
verses.ct: The upper ledge is also square — 14 cubits long and 14 cubits wide — with a rim around it half a cubit wide and a gutter at its base 1 cubit wide all around. The steps leading up to the altar face east."

verses.kjv: And he said unto me, Son of man, thus saith the Lord GOD; These are the ordinances of the altar in the day when they shall make it, to offer burnt offerings thereon, and to sprinkle blood thereon.
verses.web: He said to me, “Son of man, the Lord LORD says: ‘These are the ordinances of the altar in the day when they make it, to offer burnt offerings on it, and to sprinkle blood on it.
verses.ct: Then he said to me, "Son of man, this is what the Lord GOD says: 'These are the regulations for the altar on the day it is built, so that burnt offerings can be sacrificed on it and blood can be sprinkled against it.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt give to the priests the Levites that be of the seed of Zadok, which approach unto me, to minister unto me, saith the Lord GOD, a young bullock for a sin offering.
verses.web: You shall give to the Levitical priests who are of the offspring of Zadok, who are near to me, to minister to me,’ says the Lord LORD, ‘a young bull for a sin offering.
verses.ct: You are to give a young bull as a sin offering to the Levitical priests who are descendants of Zadok — the ones who come near to serve me,' declares the Lord GOD.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt take of the blood thereof, and put it on the four horns of it, and on the four corners of the settle, and upon the border round about: thus shalt thou cleanse and purge it.
verses.web: You shall take of its blood, and put it on its four horns, and on the four corners of the ledge, and on the border all around. You shall cleanse it and make atonement for it that way.
verses.ct: Take some of the bull's blood and put it on the altar's 4 horns, on the 4 corners of the upper ledge, and on the rim all around. This is how you will cleanse the altar and make atonement for it.

verses.kjv: Thou shalt take the bullock also of the sin offering, and he shall burn it in the appointed place of the house, without the sanctuary.
verses.web: You shall also take the bull of the sin offering, and it shall be burned in the appointed place of the house, outside of the sanctuary.
verses.ct: Then take the bull used for the sin offering and burn it in the designated area of the temple grounds, outside the sanctuary.

verses.kjv: And on the second day thou shalt offer a kid of the goats without blemish for a sin offering; and they shall cleanse the altar, as they did cleanse it with the bullock.
verses.web: “On the second day you shall offer a male goat without defect for a sin offering; and they shall cleanse the altar, as they cleansed it with the bull.
verses.ct: "On the 2nd day, offer a male goat without any defect as a sin offering. The priests will cleanse the altar with it just as they did with the bull.

verses.kjv: When thou hast made an end of cleansing it, thou shalt offer a young bullock without blemish, and a ram out of the flock without blemish.
verses.web: When you have finished cleansing it, you shall offer a young bull without defect, and a ram out of the flock without defect.
verses.ct: When you have finished the cleansing, offer a young bull without any defect and a ram from the flock without any defect.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt offer them before the LORD, and the priests shall cast salt upon them, and they shall offer them up for a burnt offering unto the LORD.
verses.web: You shall bring them near to LORD, and the priests shall cast salt on them, and they shall offer them up for a burnt offering to LORD.
verses.ct: Present them before the LORD. The priests will throw salt on them and offer them as a burnt offering to the LORD.

verses.kjv: Seven days shalt thou prepare every day a goat for a sin offering: they shall also prepare a young bullock, and a ram out of the flock, without blemish.
verses.web: “Seven days you shall prepare every day a goat for a sin offering. They shall also prepare a young bull, and a ram out of the flock, without defect.
verses.ct: "For 7 days, you are to provide a goat each day as a sin offering. A young bull and a ram from the flock, both without any defect, must also be provided each day.

verses.kjv: Seven days shall they purge the altar and purify it; and they shall consecrate themselves.
verses.web: Seven days shall they make atonement for the altar and purify it. So shall they consecrate it.
verses.ct: For 7 days the priests will make atonement for the altar and purify it. In this way they will consecrate it.

verses.kjv: And when these days are expired, it shall be, that upon the eighth day, and so forward, the priests shall make your burnt offerings upon the altar, and your peace offerings; and I will accept you, saith the Lord GOD.
verses.web: When they have accomplished the days, it shall be that on the eighth day, and forward, the priests shall make your burnt offerings on the altar, and your peace offerings. Then I will accept you,’ says the Lord LORD.”
verses.ct: When those 7 days are complete, then from the 8th day onward the priests will offer your burnt offerings and your peace offerings on the altar. And I will accept you,' declares the Lord GOD."
